title: High ms since last update
body: Hi, I have most of time in game high ping since last update. I tried reinstall game and reset router. Other online games, movies, etc. are working good. Can you help me somehow?

replies.body: I used HPT but high ping is still there.

It's not entirely uncommon to have problems doing certain things online when your web browser and youtube still work fine. This might be caused by some kind of weird network setting that isn't sitting quite right with our servers. 

Be sure to look over the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some ways you can reconfigure your settings. Let me know if you have any other questions along the way!
